Hero.hello: I am a passionate AI-ML Engineer focused on Natural Language Processing and Robotics. I build intelligent solutions using Python, Deep Learning, and Next.js.

Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.description: Take a look at what I've been building
Projects.kangri: Neural Machine Translation (NMT) system for the low-resource Kangri language using M2M100.
Projects.accident: Real-time video analysis system for detecting vehicle accidents using OpenCV and Computer Vision.
Projects.somato: Frontend clone of the Zomato application with dynamic restaurant listings and shopping cart.

Responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
Responsibilities.point1: Develop and fine-tune Machine Learning models.
Responsibilities.point3: Deploy AI solutions to cloud platforms.
Responsibilities.point6: Optimize model performance and inference time.

Achievements.title: Key Results
Achievements.point1: Developed a custom NLP model improving sentiment analysis accuracy by 20%.
Achievements.point2: Automated data extraction pipeline reducing manual effort by 80%.
Achievements.point3: Deployed computer vision system for real-time monitoring.
